fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Bite**: Deal a basic attack to somebody(2 uses)
**Farm Flesh**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role Flesh

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may attack your teammates
-If the head role has 5 Flesh, even while this is dead, turn a random non head role into Giant. If the head role is the only role alive, they turn into Giant.
-Upon death, the Minecraft(Head) gains 2 flesh.
